Read in RDB table

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
read_tbl.Rd

Fetches a table from the RDB DBMS's public schema and returns it as a tibble.

Usage

read_tbl(
  tbl_name = tbl_metadata$name,
  connection = connect(),
  disconnect = TRUE
)

Arguments

tbl_name

Table name. One of

  • "actors"

  • "options"

  • "legal_instruments"

  • "legal_norms"

  • "referendum_types"

  • "referendum_clusters"

  • "referendums"

  • "referendum_types_legal_norms"

  • "referendum_types_referendums"

  • "topics_referendums"

  • "referendum_titles"

  • "referendum_questions"

  • "referendum_positions"

  • "referendum_votes"

  • "referendum_sub_votes"

  • "administrative_units"

  • "supranational_entities"

  • "countries"

  • "subnational_entities"

  • "municipalities"

  • "languages"

  • "topics" .

connection

Database connection to a PostgreSQL DBMS as returned by connect(). An S4 object that inherits from DBI::DBIConnection.

disconnect

Whether or not to terminate the database connection when finished.

Value

A tibble.

See also

Other data functions: assert_vars(), delete_rfrnds(), rfrnd_types(), rfrnds(), rfrnds_old(), validate_rfrnds()

Examples

rdb::read_tbl("countries")
#> # A tibble: 281 × 7
#>    code  name                 name_long                       created_by updated_by created_at          updated_at         
#>    <chr> <chr>                <chr>                           <chr>      <chr>      <dttm>              <dttm>             
#>  1 GF    French Guiana        French Guiana                   rdb_admin  rdb_admin  2024-08-19 15:25:09 2024-08-19 15:32:36
#>  2 AD    Andorra              Principality of Andorra         rdb_admin  rdb_admin  2024-08-19 15:25:09 2024-08-19 15:32:36
#>  3 AE    United Arab Emirates United Arab Emirates            rdb_admin  rdb_admin  2024-08-19 15:25:09 2024-08-19 15:32:36
#>  4 AF    Afghanistan          Islamic Republic of Afghanistan rdb_admin  rdb_admin  2024-08-19 15:25:09 2024-08-19 15:32:36
#>  5 AG    Antigua and Barbuda  Antigua and Barbuda             rdb_admin  rdb_admin  2024-08-19 15:25:09 2024-08-19 15:32:36
#>  6 AI    Anguilla             Anguilla                        rdb_admin  rdb_admin  2024-08-19 15:25:09 2024-08-19 15:32:36
